		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_tertiary_child_content_2_currency_symbol]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[quote]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
     .quotes h3 {
          padding:0 10pt;
     }
     @media (max-width:767px) {
          .testimonial-section span {
               text-align:center !important;
          }
     }
</style>
“We have had numerous success stories here at MB of North Palm Beach - my favorite was an older, very nice gentleman, who had approved some repairs at write-up, then later approved additional repairs via telephone. Upon arrival to pick-up he didn't remember the correct totals, rather having in his mind the upsell amount only. <br><br>The customer himself actually asked our Service Advisor if he didn't have a way to record the conversation as he stated he would feel terrible being wrong. The SA stated, absolutely, let's listen together. They did, and indeed his memory was refreshed and all was good. The customer was actually grateful at knowing how good our documentation was and not having to worry if there was an error or reason to mistrust. <br><br>The customer gave the SA 1000, a perfect score on the follow-up survey 7 days later. myKaarma proved to be an invaluable tool once again! Thanks! 
"]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

<br>   Service Manager
<br>   Mercedes-Benz of North Palm Beach</span>]]></wp:meta_value>

MDL systems are installed in leading U.S. dealerships enabling a ‘Ritz Carlton’ level of service, increased customer retention, improved CSI, and sales opportunities. MDL’s Zonal Tracking provide automated choke-point location tracking, including auto tracking when a vehicle enters / leaves the shop, off site lot tracking and car wash monitoring. MDL’s web-based Dispatch Master effectively manages the movement operation of guest or inventory vehicles. MDL is fully integrated with leading industry partners in CRM, Sales Analytics, Service iPads, TSD Loaner Management, Customer Loyalty, and Guest Messaging (CIM). 		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[company_secondary_content]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="col-sm-6">
<h2 class="pull-left">OUR CULTURE</h2><br>
<h3 class="pull-left text-left" style="padding-bottom:30pt;">Our company is based on a fundamental tenet of customers first. Our culture of high performance employees who exhibit good judgment and are accountable for their results leads to an "innovate or die" mantra.  This culture allows us to deliver very effective customer service, and maintain a healthy work-life balance.</h3>
</div>

<div class="col-sm-5 text-right pull-right">
<div class="row">
<h2 class="pull-right" style="margin-bottom: 5px;">WHY</h2>
<p class="pull-right" style="font-weight: 400;">We believe simple and transparent interactions with customers inspires trust and long‐term loyalty!</p>
</div>
<div class="row">
<h2 class="pull-right" style="margin-bottom: 5px;">HOW</h2>
<p class="pull-right" style="font-weight: 400;">We do that by building simple, secure, scalable, and fault-tolerant systems that integrate naturally into day-to-day business, backed by a fanatical group of employees who genuinely care about their customer's success.</p>
</div>
<div class="row">
<h2 class="pull-right" style="margin-bottom: 5px;">WHAT</h2>
<p class="pull-right" style="font-weight: 400;">We deliver best in class communications and payment software for Automotive Dealers!</p>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-5 col-sm-offset-2">

myKaarma is expanding the landscape for consumers, and dealers alike, to pay and take payments anytime, on any device, and all at the convenience and happiness of your customers. No more waiting, long lines, or extra cashiers.

<button class="btn btn-header hvr-bounce-to-bottom" type="button" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#video-payments">watch how payments
can be easier</button>

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Communications</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/communications/</link>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-5 col-sm-offset-2">
        <p>In 2014, according to a study by UCSD, “The average person consumed 34 gigabytes of data  on an average day.” In order to be heard, dealers MUST change their communications to allow their customers easy access to their service advisors.</span></p>
                    <button type="button" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#video-communications" class="btn btn-header hvr-bounce-to-bottom">watch how interactions<br>become faster</button>
    </div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>

	<item>
		<title>Welcome, Mercedes-Benz Canada!</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/mercedes-benz-canada/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 22 Jan 2016 01:36:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/wp/?page_id=664</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<meta name="robots" content="noindex">
<script>
    // <![CDATA[
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('a[href*=#]').click(function () {
            if (location.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') == this.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') && location.hostname == this.hostname) {
                var $target = $(this.hash);
                $target = $target.length && $target || $('[name=' + this.hash.slice(1) + ']');
                if ($target.length) {
                    var targetOffset = $target.offset().top;
                    $('html,body')
                        .animate({
                            scrollTop: targetOffset
                        }, 1000);
                    return false;
                }
            }
        });
    });
    // ]]]]><![CDATA[>
</script>
<div class="container">
<div class="col-xs-12">
    <div class="row text-center">
        <div class="header-image center"><img class="mbc img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1072" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/toronto3.png" alt="toronto" width="2000" height="774" />
            <h1 class="dsd-lblue center">Welcome, Mercedes-Benz Canada!</h1>
            <h5 class="center">If you made it here, then you are thinking of using myKaarma as your preferred CIM software; Thanks!</h5>
            <p>On this page, you will find a form to schedule a demo. This is the best way to see myKaarma in action.
            You will see details on our two main products; Payments and Communications.
            Also, check out our brief timeline summary of what happens next, if you decide you want to use Kaarma.</p>
        </div>
    </div>
   <div class="row">
<div class="text-center col-xs-6">
<a href="http://mykaarma.com/mbcanada-price-quote/">
<button onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'btnPriceQuote', 'clicked', 'pageMbCanada')" class="btn btn-primary page-scroll">Request A Price Quote</button>
</a>
</div>
<div class="text-center col-xs-6">
<a href="http://mykaarma.com/demo/">
<button onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'btnDemo', 'clicked', 'pageMbCanada')" class="btn btn-warning page-scroll">Request A Demo</button>
</a>
</div>
    </div>
    <div class="copy">
        <div class="row center">
            <div class="col-xs-12 prod">
                <div class="row text-center">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 rowpad"></div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12">
                        <h4 class="kaarma-orange">PAYMENTS</h4>
                        <p>myKaarma is the first fully digital and integrated payments solution for dealerships.  By simplifying the checkout experience,  mykaarma payments lets you streamline your process by introducing service advisor self cashiering while also allowing your customers to pay on any device, any where and any time. No more waiting, long lines, or extra cashiers.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 rowpad"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-xs-4 dsd-lblue">
                        <h5 class="kaarma-orange">STEP 1</h5>
                        <p class="step">Kelly texts Sam to let him know his car is finished. She has included a short-link to his invoice with a PAY NOW button for Express Checkout.</p>
                        <img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1114" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/msgs-back_invoice.png" alt="msgs-back_invoice" width="600" height="1305" />

                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-4 dsd-lblue">
                        <h5 class="kaarma-orange">STEP 2</h5>
                        <p class="step">Sam’s invoice pulls up from the link, and he can view his invoice, enter his card details, and pay before he has even entered the dealership.</p>
                        <img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1112" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/invoice.png" alt="invoice" width="600" height="1305" />

                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-4 dsd-lblue">
                        <h5 class="kaarma-orange">STEP 3</h5>
                        <p class="step">Sam has paid his invoice and now he can come in and pick up his car without having to wait in line.</p>
                        <img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1113" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/mobile-pay.png" alt="mobile-pay" width="600" height="1305" />

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row center">
            <div class="col-xs-12 prod">
                <div>
                    <h4 class="kaarma-orange">COMMUNICATIONS</h4>
                </div>
                <p>myKaarma is helping the way you interact and retain your customers. Communications helps speed things up by giving your customers a single phone number for service and routing their texts and calls directly to their service advisor. The Kaarma platform records and archives customer-advisor conversations to help in case there should ever be a dispute.</p>
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-offset-1 text-center dsd-lblue"><img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1131" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/comms.png" alt="comms" width="1400" height="1554" /></div>
                    <div class="col-xs-7 dsd-lblue left">
                        <ul class="bullet-list tij bull">
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Reduce Authorization times from hours to minutes</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Real-time updates for your customers</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Send payment requests via Text or Email</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Reduce voicemails by ~80%</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;View entire customer service and payment history at a glance</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Send text messages to a single or multiple customers at once</li>
                            <li class="bullet">&#8226;&#160;&#160;Gives each service advisor ~1 hour back a day.</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <hr />

    <div class="onboard">
        <div class="row center">
            <div class="col-xs-12 prod">
                <div>
                    <h4 class="kaarma-orange">PROVISIONING YOUR DEALER</h4>
                </div>
                <div class="row"><img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1158" style="broder-radius: 3px;" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/onboarding_flyer.png" alt="onboarding_flyer" width="1200" height="914" /></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
	</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:postmeta>

	</item>

	<item>
		<title>One bad experience:The myKaarma Story</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/mykaarma-story/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 21 Mar 2016 16:20:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=969</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="container">
<div class="row" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
<div class="col-xs-2 pull-right text-right"><img class="img-responsive" style="max-height: 100px; float: right;" src="https://gallery.mailchimp.com/83a67b42a4b7ba59bfa3743eb/images/81c7fef4-1a26-473c-ab8b-626a62ac3cba.png" alt="" /></div>
<div class="col-xs-10 pull-right text-right">
<p style="font-size: 13pt; margin-top: 40px; color: #ef6d22;"><em>From the mind of myKaarma CEO, Ujj Nath</em></p>

</div>
</div>
<div style="margin-bottom: 40px;"><script src="//fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/qzzoww62yg.jsonp" async=""></script><script src="//fast.wistia.com/assets/external/E-v1.js" async=""></script>
<div class="wistia_responsive_padding" style="padding: 56.25% 0 0 0; position: relative;">
<div class="wistia_responsive_wrapper" style="height: 100%; left: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 100%;">
<div class="wistia_embed wistia_async_qzzoww62yg videoFoam=true" style="height: 100%; width: 100%;"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">I have always wondered, if I had gone to a venture capitalist for funding and told them that we were going to build a firm that did communications and payments for automotive dealers, I'm sure they would have asked the question,</p>

<blockquote>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">"what do those two things have in common?"</p>
</blockquote>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">Logically they seem disconnected, however when looked at from the consumers viewpoint it makes perfect sense because those are two of the key pain points on getting your car repaired.</p>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">This all started in 2012 when I took my car in to get repaired at my local Honda dealer. I brought my car in for an oil change and gave them a coupon they had sent me. I was expecting it back in 1 hour and when I had no communications from the dealership for 3 hours I called the dealer and heard the perennial</p>

<blockquote>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">"Thank you for calling... This call will be recorded... Press 1 for new car sales, press 2 for used car sales, 3 for service.”</p>
</blockquote>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">When I pressed 3, it rang five or six times before a person finally picked up the phone. Unfortunately, he had no idea who I was. He ended up asking my name, my vehicle model, and it's color, only to find out that my service advisor was out to lunch. I was told he was going to call me back when he returned. I never heard back from the service advisor, so I eventually ended up having to go to the store at the end of the day.  To my shock, I found that my final invoice did not have the coupon discount. Having just gone through a car rental experience using National's Emerald Club, I knew this process could be better!</p>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">Armed with this experience, we set about writing software that would make the job of the service advisor easier while drastically improving the customer experience.</p>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">In writing our software, we designed it with a few basic principles :</p>

<ol>
 	<li style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">1| We would use a "Natural Design" process, i. e. wherever possible we will not add cost to the existing workflow add no layers to the service advisor's already complex job.</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">2| All features would be designed using a Genchi Genbutsu process where you go to the place and see for yourself.</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">3| We would avoid redundant data entry whenever possible to integrate with the base sources of data. in this case the existing DMS systems.</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">4| All features would be designed using the consumers view of the process of repair and to build convenience into the process</li>
</ol>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">Three years and 400 dealers later, we have created a new category of software called <strong style="color: #ef6d22 !important;"><em>Customer Interaction Management</em></strong> where we focus on the interaction of the consumers. To date, we have processed over $740 million in payments, sent or received in excess of 12 million text messages, and placed over 2 million phone calls. Most of our dealers have sub 30 day payback periods on the monthly cost of the software.</p>

</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Features</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/our-features/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 03:38:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=1194</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<style>
    div.caption.innerpage.blank {
        display: none;
    }
    div.heading-title {
        line-height: 10pt !important;
        margin-top: 50pt;
    }
    .dealer {
        margin-bottom: 10pt;
    }
	#masthead {background: rgba(55, 55, 55, 1) !important;}
    @media only screen and (max-width:567px) {
        div.heading-title span {
            line-height: 10pt;
        }
    }
</style>

<!-- FEATURES -->
<div class="container" style="margin-top:-20pt;">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <img class="img-responsive center" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/features.png" style="max-height:400px;width:auto" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12 text-center" style="padding-top:20px;">
            <h2>OUR FEATURES SAVE YOU TIME AND MONEY!</h2>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row padsep">
        <div class="col-xs-12 text-center">
            <h5 style="text-transform:inherit;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-word;">Today’s consumers view of service has dramatically transformed over the last two decades. They have come to expect and demand a high quality user experience across the spectrum of their purchases from places like Nordstrom’s to Amazon to Uber.</h5>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row padsep">
        <div class="col-xs-12 text-center">
            <p style="text-transform:inherit;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-word;">The dilemma is that today's consumers are besieged by messages from multiple sources. According to a study by University of California San Diego, “the average person consumed 34 GB of data per day”. In order to be heard, Dealers must change the way they communicate with consumers. By making an impression and maximizing each interaction, ​they improve the likelihood of customers returning to their store by 300%. They get rid of wasted voicemails, long lines, and unhappy customers!</p>
        </div>
    </div>
	


    <div class="row padsep sep" id="">
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/tenmins.png" alt="reduced authorizations" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9">
                <h5 class="points">Authorization times reduced to under 10 minutes</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/voicemail.png" alt="reduction in voicemails" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">50% reduction in voicemails left with service advisors</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row padsep" id="">
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/disputes.png" alt="reduction in authorization disputes" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">100% reduction in authorization disputes</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/loanerdays.png" alt="decreased loaner days" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">33% decrease in "loaner-car days"</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row padsep" id="">
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/CSI-increase.png" alt="increased CSI scores" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">A 20%+ point increase in CSI scores</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/batching.png" alt="credit card batches" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">Eliminate all paperwork between advisors and controllers</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

	<a class="anchor" id="roi"></a>
	<div class="row padsep" style="background-color:#f0f0f0;margin-top:20pt;">

		<h5 style="text-transform:inherit;">Calculate your loaner car ROI</h5>

	</div>

<div class="container">
    <!-- INTEGRATIONS -->
    <a class="anchor" id="integrations"></a>
    <div class="row padsep">
        <div class="col-xs-12 padsep text-center">
            <h2>Integrations</h2>
            <h5 style="text-transform:inherit;">
                We integrate with all of the major DMS providers so that your customers details, service ROs, invoices, and reconciliations are always in sync and up-to-date.
            </h5>
        </div>
    </div>


    <div class="row padsep">
        <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-2 col-sm-offset-1">

            </h5>
        </div>
    </div>

        </div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>




    <!-- Ease of Use -->
    <a class="anchor" id="ease-of-use"></a>
    <div class="row padsep" id="ease-of-use">
        <div class="col-xs-12 padsep text-center">
            <h2>Ease of Use</h2>
            <h5 style="text-transform:lowercase;">
            Our advanced user functionality helps you and your service advisors shave minutes off every interaction. A minute here and a minute there, adds up to give you back valuable time, everyday.
        </h5>
        </div>
    </div>


    <div class="row padsep" id="">
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">
                <img class="img-responsive max140" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/search.png" alt="power search" scale="0">
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-8 col-sm-9 vcenter">
                <h5 class="points">Google-like instant search</h5>
                <p>
                    (customer first, last, part of phone #, part of email, last eight of VIN)
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6 vertical-align text-left">
            <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-3">

            </div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                <h5 class="points">Automatic and custom payment requests</h5>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<a class="anchor" id="partners"></a>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-xs-12">
        <div class="heading-title">
            <span>Partnering with only the</span>
            <span>leading automotive services</span>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">
        <div class="dealer">

        </div>

    </div>

            <a href="http://www.mydealerlot.com/" target="_blank"><img class="img-responsive partner-logos center" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/mdla.png" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="bottom" title="MDL is the country’s leader in providing total process improvement through Instant Guest Recognition & Messaging using Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) and License Plate Recognition technologies (LPR) through its Service Drive Concierge™ program. MDL’s Bloodhound™ Bluetooth beacon solution provides both Sales and Service departments with affordable vehicle location management. Dispatch Master effectively manages the movement operation of guest or inventory vehicles from any origin and destination point in a dealership."></a>
        </div>

    </div>

        </div>

<script>
	$('a[href*="#"]:not([href="#"])').click(function() {
	  if (location.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') == this.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') && location.hostname == this.hostname) {
		var target = $(this.hash);
		target = target.length ? target : $('[name=' + this.hash.slice(1) + ']');
		if (target.length) {
		  $('html, body').animate({
			scrollTop: target.offset().top
		  }, 1000);
		  return false;
		}
	  }
	});
</script>]]></content:encoded>

		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wpas_done_all]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Welcome, BMW &amp; MINI!</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/bmw/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 25 May 2016 20:14:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=1359</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<meta name="robots" content="noindex">
<style>
.caption.innerpage h1 {padding:10px 0px 20px !important;}
</style>
<script>// <![CDATA[
$(document).ready(function () { $('a[href*=#]').click(function () { if (location.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') == this.pathname.replace(/^\//, '') && location.hostname == this.hostname) { var $target = $(this.hash); $target = $target.length && $target || $('[name=' + this.hash.slice(1) + ']'); if ($target.length) { var targetOffset = $target.offset().top; $('html,body') .animate({ scrollTop: targetOffset }, 1000); return false; } } }); });
// ]]]]><![CDATA[></script>
<div class="container">
<div class="col-xs-12" style="margin-top:20pt;">
<div class="row text-center">
<div class="header-image center">

<img class="mbc img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1072" style="margin-bottom: 20pt;max-height:200pt;width:auto;" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/bmw-mini.tiny_.jpg" alt="mykaarma" />
<h5 class="center kaarma-orange">If you made it here, then you are thinking of using myKaarma as<br/>your preferred CIM software; Thanks!</h5>
<p>On this page, you will find a form to schedule a demo. This is the best way to see myKaarma in action. You will see details on our two main products; Communications and Payments. Also, check out our brief timeline summary of what happens next, if you decide you want to use myKaarma.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="text-center col-sm-6">
<a href="http://mykaarma.com/bmw-price-quote/">
<button onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'btnPriceQuote', 'clicked', 'pageBMW')" class="btn btn-primary page-scroll">Request A Price Quote</button>
</a>
</div>
<div class="text-center col-sm-6">
<a href="http://mykaarma.com/demo/">
	<button onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'btnDemo', 'clicked', 'pageBMW')" class="btn btn-warning page-scroll">Request A Demo</button>
</a>
</div>
<div class="text-center col-xs-12" style="margin-top:20pt;">
<h2>(310) 879-5005</h2>
<h5>CALL OR TEXT US</h5>
</div>

</div>
<div class="copy">
<div class="row center">
<div class="col-xs-12 prod">
<div class="row text-center">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<h4 style="font-size:20pt;margin-top:20pt;" class="kaarma-orange">PAYMENTS</h4>
<p class="just">myKaarma is the first fully digital and integrated payments solution for dealerships.  By simplifying the checkout experience,  mykaarma payments lets you streamline your process by introducing service advisor self cashiering while also allowing your customers to pay on any device, any where and any time. No more waiting, long lines, or extra cashiers.</p>

</div>
<div class="col-xs-12 rowpad"></div>
</div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-4 just">
<h5 style="font-size:20pt;color: #009fda;">STEP 1</h5>
<p class="step">Kelly texts Sam to let him know his car is finished. She has included a short-link to his invoice with a PAY NOW button for Express Checkout.</p>
<img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1114" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/msgs-back_invoice.png" alt="msgs-back_invoice" width="600" height="1305" />

</div>
<div class="col-sm-4 just">
<h5 style="font-size:20pt;color: #009fda;">STEP 2</h5>
<p class="step">Sam’s invoice pulls up from the link, and he can view his invoice, enter his card details, and pay before he has even entered the dealership.</p>
<img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1112" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/invoice.png" alt="invoice" width="600" height="1305" />

</div>
<div class="col-sm-4 just">
<h5 style="font-size:20pt;color: #009fda;">STEP 3</h5>
<p class="step">Sam has paid his invoice and now he can come in and pick up his car without having to wait in line.</p>
<img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1113" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/mobile-pay.png" alt="mobile-pay" width="600" height="1305" />

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row center">
<div class="col-xs-12 prod">
<div>
<h4 style="font-size:20pt;" class="kaarma-orange">COMMUNICATIONS</h4>
</div>
<p class="just">myKaarma is helping the way you interact and retain your customers. Communications helps speed things up by giving your customers a single phone number for service and routing their texts and calls directly to their service advisor. The myKaarma platform records and archives customer-advisor conversations to help in case there should ever be a dispute.</p>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-1 text-center dsd-lblue"><img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1131" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/comms.png" alt="comms" width="1400" height="1554" /></div>
<div class="col-sm-7 left">
<ul class="bullet-list tij bull text-left">
 	<li class="bullet">•  Reduce Authorization times from hours to minutes</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  Real-time updates for your customers</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  Send payment requests via Text or Email</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  Reduce voicemails by ~80%</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  View entire customer service and payment history at a glance</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  Send text messages to a single or multiple customers at once</li>
 	<li class="bullet">•  Gives each service advisor ~1 hour back a day.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<hr />

<div class="onboard">
<div class="row center">
<div class="col-xs-12 prod rowpad">
<div class="rowpad">

&nbsp;
<h4 style="font-size:20pt;" class="kaarma-orange">PROVISIONING YOUR DEALER</h4>
</div>
<div class="row"><img class="img-responsive aligncenter size-full wp-image-1158" style="broder-radius: 3px;" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/onboarding_flyer.png" alt="onboarding_flyer" width="1200" height="914" /></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Request A Price Quote</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/mbcanada-price-quote/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 03 Jun 2016 20:57:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=1454</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<meta name="robots" content="noindex">
<style>
	input[type="text"], input[type="number"], input[type="password"], textarea, input[type="email"], input[type="tel"], input[type="url"], select {
    margin: 0 0 8px; 
    padding: 10px; 
    width: 80%; 
}
</style>
<div class="container">

	<item>
		<title>Become A Partner</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/partners/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 06 Jul 2016 21:34:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=1681</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<section class="module parallax parallax-1">
<div class="container-fluid">
<h2>Begin a great
opportunity</h2>
</div>
</section><section class="module content">
<div class="container text-center">
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">
<h2>Partnerships are integral to our customer's success</h2>
We at myKaarma are looking to create partnerships of strategic priority, in order to enhance the value of our solution for our customers.
<blockquote>
<p style="text-align: left; font-size: 13pt;">"One of our core philosophies is to treat our partners like we would treat our customer and employees - fairly, and with respect"</p>
</blockquote>
In doing so, we take great care to partner with companies that offer services that make the job of our customer easier, and remove the pain points of switching applications or interfaces to get their job done.

</div>
</div>
</section><section class="module content look">
<div class="container text-center">
<h2 class="col-xs-12">What We Are Looking For</h2>
<ul class="look">
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Mature APIs</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Transaction-based Revenue Share</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">North American Support Presence</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Services to Grow Our Platform</li>
</ul>
</div>
</section><section class="module parallax parallax-2">
<div class="container text-center">
<h2 class="oj">What we can offer</h2>
<ul class="offer">
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Exponential Dealer Growth</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Boost Your Brand Awareness</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Revenue Share Opportunities</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Increase App Engagement</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">99% App Retention Rate</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-6">Increased Stickiness</li>
</ul>
</div>
</section><section class="module content">
<div class="container text-center"><button class="btn btn-header hvr-bounce-to-bottom" type="button" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#partner">Become A Partner</button></div>
</section><section class="module content">
<div class="container text-center">
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">
<h2 class="col-xs-12">Where we are looking</h2>
Our goal is to present the most current information that is needed to service a car efficiently and accurately. So, we are focusing on forming partnerships in the areas of:

&nbsp;

</div>
<ul class="look">
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Recalls</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Warranty</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Incentives</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Appointments</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Sentiment Analysis</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Artificial Intelligence</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Service Menus</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Online Marketing</li>
 	<li class="col-sm-4">Shuttle Management</li>
</ul>
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">

&nbsp;

</div>
</div>
</section>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>DSD 2.0 SIGN UP--DEPRECATED--removed DSD webinars</title>

        }
        .dsd-row {
            display: block;
        }
        .dsd-cell {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 30pt;
        }
        .dsd-logo {
            max-height: 20pt;
            width: auto;
        }
        .entry-content img {
            margin-bottom: 0px;
            margin-top: 0px;
        }
		.mobile-dark {
			color: #3b3b3b !important;
		}
		.mobile-pad {
			margin: 80pt 0 0 0;
		}
    }
</style>

	<item>
		<title>ROI Calc</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/roi-calc/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 20 Jul 2016 21:45:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mykaarma.com/?page_id=1788</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script src="/wp/wp-content/themes/kaarma/js/seiyria-bootstrap-slider/dist/bootstrap-slider.min.js"></script>
<script src="/wp/wp-content/themes/kaarma/js/Chart.js/dist/Chart.min.js"></script>

<div class="container frame"><h1 class="text-center">ROI Calculator</h1><div class="col-md-12"><div class="panel with-nav-tabs"><!-- <div class="panel-heading"><ul class="nav nav-pills"><li class="active"><a href="#loaners" data-toggle="tab">Loaner Car Days</a></li><li><a href="#csi" data-toggle="tab">CSI Scores</a></li></ul></div>--><div class="panel-body"><div class="tab-content"><div class="tab-pane fade in active" id="loaners"><div class="row"><div class="col-xs-12" id="numLoanerCars"><div class="col-sm-10"><h5 style="padding:0 0 10pt 0;">number of loaner cars</h5><input id="Car" data-slider-id='CarSlider' type="text" data-slider-min="5" data-slider-max="200" data-slider-step="1" data-slider-value="30" /></div><div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-2 text-center pull-right"><div class="value"><h1><span id="CarCurrentSliderValLabel"><span id="CarSliderVal">30</span></span></h1></div></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="col-xs-12" id="loanerCost"><div class="col-sm-10"><h5 style="padding:0 0 10pt 0;">loaner car cost per month</h5><input id="Cost" data-slider-id='CostSlider' type="text" data-slider-min="20" data-slider-max="1000" data-slider-step="10" data-slider-value="300" /></div><div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-2 text-center pull-right"><div class="value"><h1><span id="CostCurrentSliderValLabel"><span id="CostSliderVal">300</span></span></h1><h1 class="costDollar">$</h1></div></div></div></div><hr style="border-top: 1px solid #727272;"><div class="row"><div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6 pull-right text-right totals"><div class="row text-right"><div class="col-xs-7"><h4 id="currentCostTag">Current Total Cost:</h4></div><div class="col-xs-5"><h1 id="currentCost">27,300</h1></div></div><h1 class="dollar" id="currentCostDollar">$</h1><div class="row text-right"><div class="col-xs-7"><h4 id="myKaarmaCostTag">Total Cost with myKaarma:</h4></div><div class="col-xs-5"><h1 id="myKaarmaCost">20,611</h1></div></div><h1 class="dollar" id="myKaarmaCostDollar">$</h1><hr><div class="row text-right"><div class="col-xs-7"><h4 id="myKaarmaSavingsTag">Total myKaarma savings:</h4></div><div class="col-xs-5 text-right"><h1 id="myKaarmaSavings">6,611</h1></div></div><h1 class="dollar" id="myKaarmaSavingsDollar">$</h1></div><div id="chart" class="col-md-6"><div><canvas id="canvas"></canvas></div><script>var barChartData ={labels:["myKaarma","Current"],datasets:[{label:'Current Cost',backgroundColor:"rgba(55,55,55,0.5)",data:[100,0]},{label:'Cost w/ myKaarma',backgroundColor:"rgba(239,109,34,0.8)",data:[0,75.5]},{label:'myKaarma Savings',backgroundColor:"rgba(205,220,57,0.8)",data:[0,100]}]};window.onload = function(){var ctx = document.getElementById("canvas").getContext("2d");window.myBar = new Chart(ctx,{type:'bar',data:barChartData,options:{title:{display:false,text:"Chart.js Bar Chart - Stacked"},legend:{display:true,onClick:function(){return},},tooltips:{mode:'label'},responsive:true,scaleShowLabels:false,scales:{xAxes:[{stacked:true,display:false,}],yAxes:[{display:true,ticks:{stepSize:25,},scaleLabel:{display:true,labelString:'Percentage (%)',}}]}}})};</script></div></div></div><div class="tab-pane fade" id="csi">coming soon... </div></div></div></div></div></div><!-- /.container --><!-- IE10 viewport hack for Surface/desktop Windows 8 bug --><!-- <script src="bower_components/bootstrap/dist/js/ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js"></script>--><script type="text/javascript">//This call to ready() should be included in your page. $(document).ready(function(){// Global Vars myKaarmaSavingsFraction = 24.5 / 100;//expressed in a % divided by 100 numberOfCars = $("#CarSliderVal").text();costPerCarPerMonth = $("#CostSliderVal").text();// End Global Vars //Thanks to http://stackoverflow.com/a/149099 Number.prototype.formatMoney = function(c,d,t){var n = this,c = isNaN(c = Math.abs(c)) ? 2:c,d = d == undefined ? ".":d,t = t == undefined ? ",":t,s = n < 0 ? "-":"",i = parseInt(n = Math.abs(+n || 0).toFixed(c))+"",j =(j = i.length)>3 ? j % 3:0;return s+(j ? i.substr(0,j)+t:"")+i.substr(j).replace(/(\d{3})(?=\d)/g,"$1"+t)+(c ? d+Math.abs(n - i).toFixed(c).slice(2) :"")};function updateTotals(){var currentCost = numberOfCars * costPerCarPerMonth;var myKaarmaCost = currentCost *(1 - myKaarmaSavingsFraction);var myKaarmaSavings = currentCost - myKaarmaCost;$("#currentCost").text(Number(currentCost).formatMoney(0));//whole numbers $("#myKaarmaCost").text(Number(myKaarmaCost).formatMoney(0));//whole numbers $("#myKaarmaSavings").text(Number(myKaarmaSavings).formatMoney(0));//whole numbers // Asher to change the line below to match the div of the amount saved by myKaarma in the bar chart //$("#myKaarmaSaved").text(Number(myKaarmaSavings).formatMoney(0));//whole numbers}// number of loaner cars $("#Car").slider();$("#Car").on("slide",function(slideEvt){$("#CarSliderVal").text(slideEvt.value);numberOfCars = slideEvt.value;updateTotals()});// cost per loaner cars $("#Cost").slider();$("#Cost").on("slide",function(slideEvt){$("#CostSliderVal").text(slideEvt.value);costPerCarPerMonth = slideEvt.value;updateTotals()});updateTotals()});</script>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Remote</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/remote/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 Oct 2016 15:13:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=2181</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>TeamViewer</h2>
<div class="row">
	<button class="btn btnPrimary" onclick="window.open('https://get.teamviewer.com/84fd2ys')" style="margin-bottom:50pt;">myKaarma QuickSupport</button>
</div>

<h2>LogMeIn Rescue</h2>
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12">
		<form name="logmeinsupport" action="https://secure.logmeinrescue.com/Customer/Code.aspx" method="post">
			<span>Enter your 6-digit code </span><input type="text" name="Code" /><br />
			<input type="submit" value="Connect to technician" />
			<input type="hidden" name="tracking0" maxlength="64" /> <!-- optional -->
			<input type="hidden" name="language" maxlength="5" /> <!-- optional -->
			<input type="hidden" name="hostederrorhandling" /> <!-- optional -->
		</form>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12">
		<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://secure.logmeinrescue.com/InstantChat/InstantChat.aspx"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function loadInstantChat(){
            var ICLoader = new RescueInstantChatLoader();
            ICLoader.ICContainer = "ICContainer";
            ICLoader.HostedCSS = "https://secure.logmeinrescue.com/InstantChat/Standard/InstantChat.css";
            ICLoader.HostedLanguagesForChatOnlyMode = "https://secure.logmeinrescue.com/InstantChat/LanguagesForChatOnlyMode.js";
            ICLoader.HostedLanguagesForAppletMode = "https://secure.logmeinrescue.com/InstantChat/LanguagesForAppletMode.js";
            ICLoader.PrivateCode = document.getElementById("Code").value;
            ICLoader.Tracking0 = ""; /* optional */
            ICLoader.Language = ""; /* optional */
            ICLoader.HostedErrorHandler = function(ErrorName){} /* optional */
            ICLoader.Start();}
        function handleRebootOrRefresh(){
            if ((window.location + "").indexOf("rescuewebsessionid") != -1){document.getElementById("ICContainer").style.display=""; loadInstantChat();} /* optional */
            if (window.location.hash.length == webSessionIdLength + 1){document.getElementById("ICContainer").style.display=""; loadInstantChat();} /* optional */
        }
    </script>
</head>
<body onload="handleRebootOrRefresh();">
    <span>Enter your 6-digit code </span><input id="Code" type="text" /><br />
    <input type="button" value="Connect to technician" onclick="document.getElementById('ICContainer').style.display=''; loadInstantChat();" />
    <div id="ICContainer" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 400px; height: 500px; display: none"></div>
</body>
</html>
	</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Parts Rollout</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/parts-rollout/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 31 Oct 2016 20:22:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[webmaster]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=2204</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;
<style>
	.email-111 input {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	.wpcf7-submit {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
</style>
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2"><script src="//fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/vul2rdxtxm.jsonp" async></script><script src="//fast.wistia.com/assets/external/E-v1.js" async></script><div class="wistia_responsive_padding" style="padding:56.25% 0 0 0;position:relative;"><div class="wistia_responsive_wrapper" style="height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;"><div class="wistia_embed wistia_async_vul2rdxtxm videoFoam=true" style="height:100%;width:100%">&nbsp;</div></div></div></div>
<div class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-3" style="margin-top:20pt;">

	<h2>Enter the email address for the Parts Manager to sign up today!</h2>
[contact-form-7 id="2253" title="Parts Rollout Form"]

</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">
    <div>
		<h3 style="color:#3b3b3b;">We are happy to present to you our Parts and Mult-Department add-on! Please enter your email above to get started and feel free to review the feature list below!</h3>
	</div>

    <div class="row" style="margin-top:30pt;">
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/comm-caps.png" alt="" /></div>
        <div class="col-sm-7">
            <h5 style="text-align: left;">Communication Capabilities</h5>
            <p style="text-align: left;">(excluding sales)</p>
            <ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Send and receive text messages from your desktop</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Record 100% of inbound/outbound voice calls</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Store voicemails, calls, and text histories for 7 years</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Utilize one, unique phone number per department (Parts/Loaner/Bodyshop etc.)</li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row" style="margin-top:30pt;">
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/dms.jpg" alt="" /></div>
        <div class="col-sm-7">
            <h5 style="text-align: left;">DMS Integration</h5>
            <ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Receive parts invoices automatically through integration with CDK</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Read and send <strong>uploaded invoices</strong> if not available via integration</li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row" style="margin-top:30pt;">
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/payments.png" alt="" /></div>
        <div class="col-sm-7">
            <h5 style="text-align: left;">Payments</h5>
            <ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Capture secure, remote parts payments (or payments from other departments) via <strong>text or email</strong></li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Integrated direct deposits into the dealer’s merchant account</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; All Payments are automatically batched and reconciled in a <strong>Daily Closing Report</strong> by department</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; <strong>Integrated Payments</strong></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="row" style="margin-top:30pt;">
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/use-case.png" alt="" /></div>
        <div class="col-sm-7">
            <h5 style="text-align: left;">Use Cases</h5>
            <ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Send back-ordered parts communications</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Process mobile payments for loaner car rentals, bodyshop invoices, car deposits, and parts invoices</li>
                <li style="text-align: left;">&#8226; Better voicemail handling through an upgraded phone system</li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Parts Rollout</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/parts-rollout-inapp/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 07 Nov 2016 21:36:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[asher.peruscini]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=2279</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<style>
	.email-111 input {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	.wpcf7-submit {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	#masthead, .footer, .test-drive {
		display: none;
	}
	#main {
		margin-top: -60px;
	}
</style>
<div class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-3">

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vW1usyaKUao" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

</div>
<div class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-3" style="margin-top: 20pt;">
<h2>Enter the email address for the Parts Manager to sign up today!</h2>
[contact-form-7 id="2253" title="Parts Rollout Form"]

</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">
<div>
<h3 style="color: #3b3b3b;">We are happy to present to you our Parts and Mult-Department add-on! Please enter your email above to get started and feel free to review the feature list below!</h3>
</div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top: 30pt;">
<div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/comm-caps.png" alt="" /></div>
<div class="col-sm-7">
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Communication Capabilities</h5>
<p style="text-align: left;">(excluding sales)</p>

<ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Send and receive text messages from your desktop</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Record 100% of inbound/outbound voice calls</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Store voicemails, calls, and text histories for 7 years</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Utilize one, unique phone number per department (Parts/Loaner/Bodyshop etc.)</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top: 30pt;">
<div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/dms.jpg" alt="" /></div>
<div class="col-sm-7">
<h5 style="text-align: left;">DMS Integration</h5>
<ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Receive parts invoices automatically through integration with CDK</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Read and send <strong>uploaded invoices</strong> if not available via integration</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top: 30pt;">
<div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/payments.png" alt="" /></div>
<div class="col-sm-7">
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Payments</h5>
<ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Capture secure, remote parts payments (or payments from other departments) via <strong>text or email</strong></li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Integrated direct deposits into the dealer’s merchant account</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• All Payments are automatically batched and reconciled in a <strong>Daily Closing Report</strong> by department</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• <strong>Integrated Payments</strong></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top: 30pt;">
<div class="col-sm-3 col-sm-offset-1"><img class="img-responsive" src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/use-case.png" alt="" /></div>
<div class="col-sm-7">
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Use Cases</h5>
<ul class="margin-top:20pt;">
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Send back-ordered parts communications</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Process mobile payments for loaner car rentals, bodyshop invoices, car deposits, and parts invoices</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">• Better voicemail handling through an upgraded phone system</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>NADA 2017 Demo</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/nada2017demo/</link>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>STATUS</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/status-inapp/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 22 Nov 2016 18:02:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[asher.peruscini]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=2378</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<style>
	.email-111 input {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	.wpcf7-submit {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	#masthead, .footer, .test-drive {
		display: none;
	}
	#main {
		margin-top: -60px;
	}
	.clickable{
		cursor: pointer;   
	}

	.panel-heading span {
		margin-top: -20px;
		font-size: 15px;
	}
	span.ico {
		margin-top: -18pt;
	}
	.panel-heading {
		max-height: 32pt;
		border-bottom: 0px solid transparent;
	}
	.panel-body {
		padding: 0px 0px 15pt;
	}
	.issue-date h7 {
		font-size:200;
	}
</style>

<script>
	$(document).on('click', 'div.panel-heading.clickable', function(e){
		var $this = $(this);
		if(!$this.hasClass('panel-collapsed')) {
			$this.parents('.panel').find('.panel-body').slideUp();
			$this.addClass('panel-collapsed');
			$this.find('i').removeClass('fa fa-minus').addClass('fa fa-plus');
		} else {
			$this.parents('.panel').find('.panel-body').slideDown();
			$this.removeClass('panel-collapsed');
			$this.find('i').removeClass('fa fa-plus').addClass('fa fa-minus');
		}
	})
</script>

<div class="container">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1">
			<div class="panel panel-warning">
				<div class="panel-heading clickable">
					<h3 class="panel-title">API Connections</h3>
					<span class="pull-right ico"><i class="fa fa-minus"></i></span>
				</div>
				<div class="panel-body">
					<div class="row" style="padding:10pt;margin: 0px 0px 15pt;background-color:#fcf8e3;">
						<div class="col-sm-5 issue-date text-left">
							<h7>Monday, November 22nd, 2016</h7>
						</div>
						<div class="col-sm-7 issue-title text-right">
							<h7><strong>AutoMate API Connection Issue</strong></h7>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="row" style="padding: 0px 10pt 0px;">
						<div class="col-sm-4 issue-date text-left">
							<p><i>IMPACTED AREAS:</i></p>
							<ul>
								<li>• Pulling RO Data</li>
								<li>• Welcome Texts</li>
								<li>• Auto-Pay Requests</li>
							</ul>
						</div>
						<div class="col-sm-8 issue-date text-left">
							<p>Please be advised that Automate’s Integration with myKaarma is currently down. As a result of this you may be unable to pull DMS data and automations such as the payment request and welcome text may not be sending correctly. Our team is working diligently with Automate to resolve this as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1">
			<div class="panel panel-success">
				<div class="panel-heading clickable panel-collapsed">
					<h3 class="panel-title">Communications</h3>
					<span class="pull-right ico"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i></span>

				<div class="panel-body" style="display:none">No reported issues</div>

		<title></title>

	.email-111 input {
		padding: 10pt;
	}

		padding: 10pt;
	}
	#masthead, .footer, .test-drive {
		display: none;
	}

		margin-top: -60px;
	}

	.caption {padding: 0px;}
</style>

<div class="col-sm-6" style="margin-top: 20pt;">
	<img src="//mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/unoff-dsd-logo.png" alt="DSD Logo" class="img-responsive left">
</div>

		<title>Recall</title>
		<link>https://goo.gl/forms/Mp1FhHqSMDrbWJDL2</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 17 Jan 2017 17:57:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[asher.peruscini]]></dc:creator>

	<item>
		<title>Usage Reporting Changes</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/daily-weekly-usage-reports/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 08 Feb 2017 06:16:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gaurav.sharma@mykaarma.com]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=2778</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<style>
	.email-111 input {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	.wpcf7-submit {
		padding: 10pt;
	}
	#masthead, .footer, .test-drive {
		display: none;
	}
	#main {
		margin-top: -60px;
	}
</style>
<div class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-3" style="margin-top: 20pt;">
<h2>Announcing Daily and Weekly Email Usage Report Changes</h2>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2">
<div>
<h3 style="color: #3b3b3b;">We are happy to announce that your daily and weekly reports have been made consistent with the Reporting Dashboard!</h3>
</div>
<p style="text-align: center;">You will now get the daily report and the weekly report with the image below:
This image will link directly to your reporting dashboard, allowing you to change date parameters.</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">As always, please contact support at (562) 349-1346, if you have any questions.</p>
<img class="alignnone wp-image-2784 size-large aligncenter" src="https://mykaarma.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/temp-480x1024.png" width="480" height="1024" />

</div>]]></content:encoded>

<section class="steps-error dsd collapse headpad">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12">
                <div class="col-xs-12 text-center">

                    <h4>Uh-oh!</h4>
                </div>

                <div class="">
                    <p>Looks like you encountered an error.</p>

                </div>

	<item>
		<title>DSD 2.0 SIGN UP-DEPRECATED</title>
		<link>https://mykaarma.com/dsd-2-0-sign/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 13 Feb 2017 20:59:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gaurav.sharma@mykaarma.com]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://mykaarma.com/?page_id=3021</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<style>
    .modal-header .close .x {
        margin-top: -14px;
    }
    #branding {
        margin-bottom: 10pt;
        margin-top: 10pt;
		text-align: center;
    }
    @media (max-width:767px) {
        #branding {
            margin-top: 5pt !important;
        }
    }
    .step {
        margin: 10pt 0px;
    }
    .headpad {
        margin-top: 20pt;
		text-align: center;
    }
    header,
    .navbar-header,
    .blank {
        display: none;
    }
    section.dsd {
        margin-top:10pt;
        margin-bottom:30pt;
    }
    section.steps-success {
        background:#58B957;
        padding: 20pt 0px 20pt;
        color:#fff!important;
    }
    section.steps-error {
        background:#D9534F;
        padding: 20pt 0px 20pt;
        color:#fff!important;
    }
    section.steps-success h4,
    section.steps-success p,
    section.steps-error h4,
    section.steps-error p {
        color: #fff;
    }
</style>
<div class="container headpad center">
<div id="branding"><img class="center img-responsive" style="max-width: 40%;" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/DSD_Horizontal_Logo_pos.png" alt="dsd" /><img class="img-responsive center" style="max-width: 15%;" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/poweredby.png" alt="powered-by-mykaarma" /></div>
<div><script src="//fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/rw8mrmgzru.jsonp" async></script><script src="//fast.wistia.com/assets/external/E-v1.js" async></script>
<div class="wistia_responsive_padding center" style="padding: 35% 0 0 0; position: relative; width: 50%; margin: auto;">
<div class="wistia_responsive_wrapper center" style="height: 100%; left: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 100%;">
<div class="wistia_embed center wistia_async_rw8mrmgzru seo=false videoFoam=true" style="height: 60%; width: 60%;text-align: center"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<section class="steps-success dsd collapse">
<div class="container">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class="col-xs-12 text-center"><i class="fa fa-check fa-4x" style="padding-right: 0px;"></i>
<h4>That's it!</h4>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class="">

Check your email for the PDF contract to sign.

</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class=""><button class="btn btn-default" name="button" type="button">SIGN UP ANOTHER DEALER</button></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section><section class="steps-error dsd collapse">
<div class="container">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class="col-xs-12 text-center"><i class="fa fa-times fa-4x" style="padding-right: 0px;"></i>
<h4>Uh-oh!</h4>
</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class="">

Looks like you encountered an error.

Please call our support line so we can further assist you.

</div>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-12">
<div class=""><button class="btn btn-default" name="button" type="button">CALL US @ (562) 349-1367</button></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="wistia_embed wistia_async_1ip5ge916h seo=false videoFoam=true" style="height: 100%; width: 100%;"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<script>
	var QUERY_URL = "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbwVW_Q9WKw_3KTD3Dh6kJdo5BfBLCeNt16j4twQ3qABvgnQ5Ao/exec"
	$( document ).ready(function(){
			// hook to the stage 1 button
		$('#btn-get-dealer-details').click(function(event){
				// on form submit, do a lookup
			 	ga('send', 'event', 'btnDSD', 'clicked', 'getDetails');
				// TODO empty values
				$('#btn-get-dealer-details').prop("disabled", true);
				$('#btn-get-dealer-details').text("Loading...");
				var dealerCode = $("#dealer-code").val();
				var dealerZIP = $("#dealer-zip").val();
				console.log("DCode: " + dealerCode + "; DZIP: " + dealerZIP);
				var jqxhr = $.get(QUERY_URL, {"dealercode" : dealerCode, "zip" : dealerZIP}, function(data){
						// parse results as JSON, pupulate form 2
						console.log("Got this back: " + data);
						//TODO what if data[] has no element.
						var dealerName = data[0].dealerName;
						var dealerPhone = data[0].dealerPhone;
						var dealerRepName = data[0].contactName;
						var dealerRepPhone = data[0].contactPhone;
						var dealerRepEmail = data[0].contactEmail;
						$("#dealer-name").val(dealerName);
						$("#dealer-phone").val(dealerPhone);
						$("#dealer-rep").val(dealerRepName);
						$("#dealer-rep-phone").val(dealerRepPhone);
						$("#dealer-rep-email").val(dealerRepEmail);
					})
				  .fail(function() {
					console.log( "error in form submit" );
				  })
				  .always(function() {
					  // re-enable after the process
					$('#btn-get-dealer-details').prop("disabled", false);
					$('#btn-get-dealer-details').text("Update Dealer Details");
				  });
				// TODO
				// on submit, replace the button contents with a spinning gif; disable button. Restore when return
				// handle errors nicely - show error div
				// do not enable the final submit button unless both forms have data
				// this prevents the whole page from reloading
				event.preventDefault();
			});
		});
</script>]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.4/css/bootstrap.min.css">
<style>
    /* DSD BRAND PAGE SETUP */
    #masthead, #primary, .footer, .test-drive { display: none; }

    /* STYLES */
    .modal-header .close .x { margin-top: -14px; }
    #branding { margin-bottom: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt; }
    .dsd-logo { max-height: 30pt; width: auto; }
    .entry-content img { margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top:-7pt; }
    .step { margin: 0pt 0px; }
    .headpad { margin-top: 40pt; text-align: center; }
    .vid-pad { padding: 10pt; }

    /* PACKAGE TABLES */
    section.dsd { margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; }
    section.steps-success { background: #58B957; padding: 0pt 0px 0pt; color: #fff!important;}
    section.steps-error { background: #D9534F; padding: 0pt 0px 0pt; color: #fff!important; }
    section.steps-success h4, section.steps-success p, section.steps-error h4, section.steps-error p { color: #fff; }
    .ro-bold:hover { background: #007dc3; }
    .ro-bold a:hover { font-weight: 700; color: #fff !important; }
    .navbar, #navbar ul li { height: 38pt; margin-bottom: 0px; }
    .jumbotron { margin: 0px -10pt; border-radius: 0px; }
    .dsd-bg-image { background: url('/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/dsd-bg.png') no-repeat fixed center center; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover; position: absolute; }
    .dsd-bg-image::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0), rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)); opacity: 1; }
    .dsd-web-img { background: url('/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/dsd-inside.png') no-repeat center center; -webkit-background-size: cover; -moz-background-size: cover; -o-background-size: cover; background-size: cover; min-height: 390pt; }
    .dsd-web-img::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(114, 114, 114, 0), rgba(114, 114, 114, 1)); opacity: 1; }
    .dsd-header { height: 500pt; position: relative; }
    .white { color: #fff !important; }
    .navbar-collapse { border-top: 0px solid transparent; -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, .1); box-shadow: inset 0 0px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, .1); }

    .myk-logo { max-height: 40pt; margin-top: 30pt !important; }

    .dsd-vid { margin-bottom: 10pt; }
    #dsd-webvids { background: #727272; border-radius: 3px; }
    .modal-footer { text-align: center !important; }
    .dsd-bg-color { background: #5E738F; }

    /* LINKING */
    a.rollover { color: #f0f0f0; }
    a.rollover:hover { color: #007dc3; }
    a.get-contract, a.get-contract i { background-color: #fff !important; border-color: #fff !important; }

    #adv-contract, .packAdv { color: #f39c11 !important; }
    #tech-contract, .packTech { color: #007dc3 !important; }
    .stretch { margin: -30pt -15pt 0; }
    .price-content { border: 0px solid !important; }
    .myk_price-1 { background-color: #E8F6F3 !important; }
    .myk_price-2 { background-color: #FEF5E7 !important; }
    .myk_price-3 { background-color: #E6F2F9 !important; }
    .btn-header { background: rgba(0, 125, 195, 0.7) !important; color: #fff; padding: 10pt;}
    .btn-header:hover { background: rgb(0, 125, 195, 0.95)!important; }

    /* FAQ ACCORDION */
    .accordion-toggle .panel-heading:after { font-family: 'Glyphicons Halflings'; content: "\e114"; float: right; color: grey; margin-top: -15pt; }
    .accordion-toggle.collapsed .panel-heading:after { content: "\e080"; }
    .panel-heading { background-color:#f0f0f0 !important;}
    .panel-body { padding: 15pt 50pt; }
    .panel-title { padding: 5pt 50pt 5pt 0; }
    .panel-group { text-align: left; }
    ul.faq { margin: 10pt 0 0 10pt;}

    /* MEDIA QUERIES */
    @media (min-width:768px) /* DESKTOP & HD-DESKTOP */ {
        .button-pad { margin: 20pt 0 0 0 !important;}
    }
    @media (max-width:767px) /* MOBILE & TABLET */ {
        #branding { margin-top: 5pt !important; }
        .navbar-collapse { background: #007dc3; }
        .navbar-nav li a { color: #fff !important; }
        .dsd-row { display: block; }
        .dsd-cell { margin: 0; padding: 30pt; }
        .dsd-logo { max-height: 20pt; width: auto; }
        .entry-content img { margin-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; }
        .mobile-dark { color: #3b3b3b !important; }
        .mobile-pad { margin: 80pt 0 0 0; }
    }
</style>

    <!-- FAQs -->
    <h1>FAQs</h1>
    <div class="container" style="margin-top: 20pt;">
        <div class="panel-group" id="accordion">
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqOne">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Are the marketing and multi-point inspection programs included in DSD2017?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqOne" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        No. The <u>Engage</u> and <u>Inspect</u> programs are both separate from the Digital Service Drive.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqTwo">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Are there any integrations between DSD2017 and other programs?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqTwo" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes. DSD2017 will integrate with the Inspect program to send out all communication on behalf of the one DSD number as well as send notifications through the DSD program.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqThree">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Are there any exclusive features provided in the DSD program that would not be offered if we bought these technologies from another vendor?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqThree" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes. The following items are not available anywhere else besides DSD2017:
                        <ul class="faq">
                            <li>•  Ability to sell Mercedes Benz Pre-paid Maintenance packages and market them directly to their customers.</li>
                            <li>•  Ability to sells vehicles online through Mercedes digital properties.</li>
                            <li>•  Recall campaigns by text to customers who have pending open recalls on their vehicles. Shown to drive large customer pay increase.</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqFour">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            How will me and my staff be trained on the new add on features of Digital Service Drive 2.0?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqFour" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        We will be conducting a host of webinar trainings on the newest features of the DSD2017 while your dealership will also be assigned a designated DSD2017 representing that will conduct in person trainings.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqFive">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Can I only use the texting and payments part of DSD2017 and use my own online scheduling system?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqFive" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes. In this case, you will want to go with either the <strong class="packBase">BASE</strong> or <strong class="packAdv">ADVANCED</strong> packages.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqSix">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Does DSD2017 provide an online scheduling system?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqSix" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes. DSD2017 will provide a calendar management system, online scheduling portal, and text/chat based appointment communication widget.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqSeven">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Will I get appointments through the connected car or the “Mercedes Me” interface?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqSeven" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes you will, as long as you subscribe to the DSD2017 - <strong class="packTech">TECHNOLOGY</strong> Package program.  Customers will be able to make appointments for your dealership directly from their car in the futures.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqEight">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                            Are data integration fee’s included in the base price?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqEight" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        No. Data integration will be a separate charge as outlined in the DSD agreement.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="panel panel-default">
                <a class="accordion-toggle link" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#faqNine">
                    <div class="panel-heading">
                        <h4 class="panel-title">
                             Will there be ongoing training included in each package?
                        </h4>
                    </div>
                </a>
                <div id="faqNine" class="panel-collapse collapse">
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        Yes. Mercedes-Benz will have an assigned DSD representative for each area that will be scheduling training and consulting at your store.
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- end of FAQs -->

    <!-- POWERED BY -->
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12">
                <img class="img-responsive myk-logo center" src="/wp/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/poweredby.png" alt="powered by myKaarma" />
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- end of POWERED BY -->
</div>
<!-- end of MAIN COPY -->
